posts.post_content:
I have the following two T206 cards for sale in PSA graded format as follows:

1. Mickey Doolan (Fielding) in a PSA 2.5 Good + condition. Back is a S/C 350, Factory 30. Card is centered 60/40 side to side and 60/40 top to bottom. $40 delivered.

2. Patsy Dougherty (Portrait) in a PSA 2 Good condition. Back is a Piedmont 150, Factory 25. Card is centered 55/45 both ways. $40 delivered.

Payment by PayPal F/F only to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. See attached scans for further details on each card.

Thanks for looking.

Bill
